valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 14 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 15 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected Southeast Iceland 978 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Biscay 1010 losing its identity

In southeast, occasional rain. In northwest, rain or showers.
